scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, crowned and seated on a throne-like cushion, extending his hand to the Virgin Mary, who is also crowned and kneeling before him. Christ holds a golden orb. To the left, an angel, with green wings and a golden halo, stands with hands clasped in prayer. The figures are set against a backdrop of draped orange fabric and a richly patterned gold, blue, and red tessellated surface. The overall composition is framed by an arched border with decorative floral motifs.
